name: Naughty Nian
description:
Lunar New Year is a grand festival full of delicious food, thrilling fireworks, and for some...a great opportunity for mischief.

When a Nian costume is found unattended by two young children, they seized the opportunity to play a trick on their fellow festival goers, wandering around the crowds in hopes of scaring the street vendors into giving them food. While this earns them a few free meals, not all of the adults are so easily fooled, and when the kids get noticed by a one of the attendees, they'll immediately try to catch the naughty children...but they're in for a surprise, because one of the kids swiped some fireworks and they are determined not to get caught.

Nordic Game Jam 2023 Submission

Team:

Arseny Dremin - Programming
